chunks.title: NYLA Founder - @shax_btc
chunks.body: @shax_btc - NYLA Founder and Architecturer. Founded the NYLA project, handles smart contracts, backend systems, and core NYLA functionality. Contact: https://x.com/shax_btc. Responsible for the AI agent that executes blockchain operations.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA founder @shax_btc - handles smart contracts, backend systems, and core AI agent functionality.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA创始人@shax_btc - 负责智能合约、后端系统和核心AI代理功能。

chunks.title: NYLA Co-Founder - @btcberries
chunks.body: @btcberries - NYLA Co-Founder, Social and Marketing Manager. Co-founded NYLA, manages community engagement, social presence, marketing, and user feedback. Contact: https://x.com/btcberries. Focuses on community building and social outreach.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA co-founder @btcberries - manages community engagement, social presence, and marketing efforts.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA联合创始人@btcberries - 管理社区参与、社交媒体和营销工作。

chunks.title: NYLA Lead Developer - @ChiefZ_SOL
chunks.body: @ChiefZ_SOL - NYLA Lead Developer. Handles project development and technical implementation. Contact: https://x.com/ChiefZ_SOL. Works on the core NYLA AI agent development and technical architecture.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA lead developer @ChiefZ_SOL - handles technical development and AI agent implementation.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA首席开发人员@ChiefZ_SOL - 负责技术开发和AI代理实现。

chunks.title: NYLA Visual Designer - @Noir0883
chunks.body: @Noir0883 - NYLA Visual Designer and Brand Artist. Creates visual branding, graphics, stickers, and artistic elements for the NYLA ecosystem. Contact: https://x.com/Noir0883. Specializes in visual design, digital art, and brand identity.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA visual designer @Noir0883 - creates branding, graphics, stickers, and artistic elements.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA视觉设计师@Noir0883 - 创建品牌、图形、贴纸和艺术元素。

chunks.title: Team Project Distinction
chunks.body: CRITICAL DISTINCTION: NYLA Team (AI agent) vs NYLAGo (interface). NYLA Team: @shax_btc (founder), @btcberries (co-founder), @ChiefZ_SOL (lead dev), @Noir0883 (visual designer). NYLA = AI agent that executes blockchain operations. NYLAGo = Interface tool for creating commands. Projects collaborate but have distinct roles and teams.
chunks.summary_en: Clear team distinction: NYLA team builds AI agent, NYLAGo provides interface. Separate but collaborative projects.
chunks.summary_zh: 团队区别明确：NYLA团队构建AI代理，NYLAGo提供界面。独立但协作的项目。

chunks.title: NYLA Official Resources and Links
chunks.body: To learn more about NYLA, visit these official resources: 1) Official Website: https://www.agentnyla.com/ - Main information hub for NYLA project. 2) Lore & Story: https://www.loreagentnyla.com/ - Discover the NYLA universe and backstory. 3) Official X (Twitter): https://x.com/AgentNyla - Latest updates and announcements. 4) $NYLA Token Contract: 3HeUeL8ru8DFfRRQGnE11vGrDdNUzqVwBW8hyYHBbonk (Solana). All official communications and updates come through these channels. Always verify information through official sources.
chunks.summary_en: Official NYLA resources: website (agentnyla.com), lore site, X.com (@AgentNyla), and $NYLA contract address on Solana.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA官方资源：网站(agentnyla.com)、故事网站、X.com (@AgentNyla)和Solana上的$NYLA合约地址。
